thread.title: enSilo's Global Director of Channel Sales, John Bolger, Recognized as 2018 CRN® Channel Chief

author: cnbc.com
title: enSilo's Global Director of Channel Sales, John Bolger, Recognized as 2018 CRN® Channel Chief
text:
SAN FRANCISCO, Feb. 12, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- enSilo, the company that protects endpoints pre- and post-infection and stops data breaches and tampering in real time, today announced that CRN ® , a brand of The Channel Company , has named John Bolger, Global Director Channel Sales, to its prestigious list of 2018 Channel Chiefs. The executives on this annual list represent top leaders in the IT channel who excel at driving growth and revenue in their organization through channel partners.
Channel Chief honorees are selected by CRN's editorial staff on the basis of professional achievements, their standing in the industry, dedication to the channel partner community, and strategies for driving future growth and innovation. Each of the 2018 Channel Chiefs has demonstrated loyalty and ongoing support for the IT channel by consistently promoting, defending and executing outstanding channel partner programs.
Bolger was chosen based on his outstanding accomplishments at enSilo. Under Bolger's leadership, enSilo dramatically expanded its channel partner presence by more than 100 percent in 2017. enSilo's channel-focused initiatives include a monthly webinar series updating partners on enSilo research, features and security strategies and a revamped channel sales development program called "Getting enSync with enSilo," aimed at increasing partner-to-prospect productivity with added strengthening of the enSilo field sales and channel community.
"The executives on CRN's 2018 Channel Chiefs list stand out for their exceptional leadership, vision and commitment to the channel," said Robert Faletra, Executive Chairman of The Channel Company. "These individuals deserve special recognition for their development and support of robust partner programs, innovative business strategy and significant contribution to the overall health of a vigorously growing channel. We applaud each Channel Chief's impressive record of accomplishments and look forward to their future successes."
"enSilo delivers a highly differentiated, pre- and post-infection, endpoint security product. Our ability to stop data breaches and tampering associated with malware, in real-time and provide a comprehensive endpoint security solution addressing prevention, detection, containment, investigation and remediation requirements, all in one single lightweight agent that is cloud managed, seems to really resonate with our partners as a differentiated offering," said Roy Katmor, CEO of enSilo. "We are thrilled to have John driving our partner strategy, to ensure that our partners are able to capitalize on enSilo product offering and win business. As a company, we are committed to making our value added reseller (VARs), managed service providers (MSPs) and managed detection and response (MDRs) successful in offering a differentiated zero breach response time endpoint protection solutions and offerings to combat today's modern ransomware and malware threats attempting to breach organizations."
To learn more about enSilo's award winning partner program, visit https://www.ensilo.com/partners-mssp .
The 2018 CRN Channel Chiefs list, including the 50 Most Influential Channel Chiefs, is featured online at www.crn.com/channelchiefs and will appear in the February 2018 issue of CRN.

About enSilo
enSilo comprehensively secures the endpoint pre- and post-infection. enSilo automates and orchestrates detection, prevention and real-time response against advanced malware and ransomware without burdening cybersecurity staff. enSilo's single lightweight agent includes next generation antivirus (NGAV), application communication control, automated endpoint detection and response (EDR) with real-time blocking, threat hunting, incident response and virtual patching capabilities. Coupled with a patented approach that has full system visibility, enSilo's endpoint security solution stops modern malware with a high degree of precision and intuitive user interface. Cybersecurity staff with enSilo can effectively manage malware threats without alert fatigue, excessive dwell time or breach anxiety. enSilo's cloud management platform is flexible and extensible to meet operational needs that stop malware impact. For more information please visit www.ensilo.com .
